backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing meeting session management, user profiles, panic events, audit logging, session recordings, and role-based access control with authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the restoration of application state to Version 24, listing affected files and components with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including routing, authentication, dashboard components, hooks, and page implementations with specific implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components, charts, and sidebar elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with PWA manifest, favicon, theme color, and Inter font preloading for the AXON SOVEREIGN application.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining AXON Remote as a standalone portrait-mode mobile app with icons and black theme colors.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with public routes (landing, login, tactical remote) and protected dashboard routes wrapped in DashboardLayout with role-based guards.
frontend/src/components/admin/AuditLogVi: Admin component displaying paginated audit logs with action filtering, CSV export functionality, and success/failure status badges.
frontend/src/components/admin/SystemHeal: Displays backend system health metrics including cycles balance, heap/stable memory usage, and query/update call counts with color-coded status indicators and refresh capability.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Biomet: Renders a radar chart visualizing five biometric stress metrics (executive stress, vocal stability, background noise, packet health, privacy score) with simulated real-time updates.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Emotio: Displays a stacked area chart tracking seven emotion types over time with toggleable legend items and simulated real-time emotion data generation.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Global: Visualizes a simplified world map with animated node pulses representing distributed network activity across four global locations (San Francisco, London, Tokyo, Bangalore).
frontend/src/components/analytics/LiveTr: Shows a real-time area chart of network traffic data that updates every 3 seconds with a sliding window of 20 data points.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Meetin: Displays a card component showing meeting details including title, duration, participant count, sentiment score, cost, and optional summary.
Shows a live-updating cost tracker for meetings that increments at ₹12.5/second with pause/resume functionality.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Neural: Renders a terminal-style scrolling log display showing simulated real-time security events across four categories (ENCRYPT, PACKET, NEURAL, QUANTUM).
frontend/src/components/analytics/Quantu: Displays a dashboard panel showing quantum encryption metrics including key rotation rate, quantum resistance level, lattice crypto status, and post-quantum readiness score with animated visual indicators.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Recent: Renders a table of recent files with columns for name, security level, status, and owner, using color-coded badges to indicate security levels and file statuses.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Sentim: Displays a live-updating area chart tracking vocal stress and emotional tension metrics over time, with data points refreshing every 3 seconds.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Speake: Shows a list of speakers with their vocal frequency ranges and activity levels, displaying animated progress bars that update every 3 seconds.
frontend/src/components/analytics/System: Implements a terminal-style scrolling log display showing real-time system security events across categories like encryption, authentication, network, and biometrics.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Threat: Presents a grid matrix of threat detection cells showing attack vectors across different categories, with color-coded severity levels and active threat indicators that update every 5 seconds.
frontend/src/components/analytics/VoiceP: Displays a timeline visualization of speaker voice patterns with segments showing speaker activity, volume, and duration over a 5-minute period. Includes interactive segment selection and real-time playback indicator.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthPanel.t: Renders a glassmorphic authentication panel container with tactical scanlines overlay and AXON logo. Provides consistent styling wrapper for auth-related child components.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedRo: Guards routes by checking session validity via localStorage and redirects to login if inactive. Shows loading spinner during authentication check.
frontend/src/components/auth/RegisterVie: Registration form component with fields for full name, email, password, and password confirmation. Includes password visibility toggles and form validation.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleProtect: Guards routes based on user role (admin/user) by querying backend API and redirects unauthorized users to dashboard. Displays loading state during permission verification.
Sign-in form with email/password inputs, remember-me checkbox, and social login buttons (Google/Facebook). Includes password visibility toggle and loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ThreeBackgr: Animated 3D background using Three.js with floating geometric shapes (cubes, spheres, torus) that rotate and float over a radial gradient. Applies blur effect for depth.
frontend/src/components/common/ActiveSta: Displays a pulsing green dot indicator with tooltip showing 'Status: Active'. Used to indicate live/active system status.
frontend/src/components/common/FeatureLo: Full-screen overlay modal that blocks access to premium features, prompting users to upgrade to Shield tier subscription. Includes navigation to subscription page.
frontend/src/components/common/HotkeysRe: Modal dialog displaying searchable keyboard shortcuts organized by category (Security Protocols, Privacy Features, System Commands, Navigation). Opens with '?' key and closes with Escape.
frontend/src/components/common/MetricCar: Reusable card component for displaying metrics with title, value, icon, and optional trend indicator (up/down arrow with percentage).
frontend/src/components/common/PrimaryCT: Styled primary call-to-action button with emerald gradient, hover effects, and shadow animations.
frontend/src/components/common/SentinelP: Fixed floating panic button that triggers emergency protocol with confirmation dialog, terminates sessions, and navigates to sentinel dashboard.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Active: Card displaying team members with avatars and roles, allowing admins to revoke access with toast notifications.
Card displaying the current subscription plan (Sovereign Enterprise) with badge and feature description.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/AssetS: Card showing protected assets value in INR currency that auto-increments every 2 seconds to simulate real-time updates.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Contro: Card with toggle switches for Neural Shield and Stealth Mode features, persisting state to sessionStorage and logging events via telemetry.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Global: Animated canvas visualization showing global node locations (NYC, London, Tokyo) with pulsing emerald dots and glow effects.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/KPIMet: Grid of four KPI metric cards showing secured meetings, active nodes, threats neutralized (with bar chart), and health score (with radial gauge).
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Neural: A card component with URL input and verification button for meeting links, featuring simulated verification with toast notifications and visual feedback states.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Overvi: Dashboard overview card displaying system security health as primary KPI (98%), along with grouped network stats and team access metrics with trend indicators.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Pricin: Two-tier pricing table component (SOVEREIGN CORE ₹299/month and GLOBAL SHIELD ₹499/month) with feature lists and subscription management using useSubscriptionTier hook.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Quantu: Simple status card displaying microphone status, latency (14ms), and participant count (12) with icon indicators.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/QuickA: Card with two action buttons: Ghost Mode toggle and Tactical Exit (logout) that clears session data and redirects to login.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Securi: Card component displaying a 7-day security traffic trend line chart using Recharts library with mock data.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Spectr: Card with animated canvas displaying sine wave visualization using requestAnimationFrame for real-time spectral analysis effect.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Synops: Card showing a loading spinner and 'awaiting verified intel link' message, representing an idle state waiting for input.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/TeamMa: Team member list card with revoke access functionality, displaying member names, emails, status indicators, and removal buttons.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/TeamSt: Simple card displaying a list of team members with their active/idle status indicated by colored dots.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Teleme: Displays a scrollable feed of telemetry events with color-coded types (success, warning, error) and timestamps, consuming events from TelemetryContext.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/VocalH: Renders a circular progress indicator showing vocal health score (98.4/100) with an SVG gradient ring and "Digital Twin" label.
frontend/src/components/dev/PerformanceO: Toggleable FPS monitor overlay (Ctrl+Shift+F) that measures frame rate using requestAnimationFrame and displays color-coded performance warnings.
frontend/src/components/effects/BorderBe: Animated border effect component that creates a moving gradient beam along the edges of its container using CSS animations.
frontend/src/components/effects/Sovereig: 3D rotating orb visualization with radial gradient, glow effects, and ripple animations on hover, representing a neural core.
frontend/src/components/errors/ErrorBoun: React error boundary component that catches errors and displays a styled fallback UI with error details and recovery options.
frontend/src/components/layout/BentoCard: Reusable card wrapper component with glassmorphism styling and optional animated border beam effect.
frontend/src/components/layout/Dashboard: Main dashboard layout with sidebar navigation, user profile, subscription tier checks, and mobile menu support. Handles routing and authentication state.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Site footer with four-column grid layout containing brand info, product links, resources, and legal links with social media icons.
frontend/src/components/MagneticButton.t: Button component with magnetic attraction effect that translates based on mouse position with configurable strength and smooth transitions.
frontend/src/components/mobile/Biometric: A biometric authentication component supporting fingerprint and face ID scanning modes with animated progress, haptic feedback, and simulated success/error states.
frontend/src/components/neural/AIMirrorS: Displays the readiness status of an AI voice proxy with visual indicators showing either active/ready or standby state.
frontend/src/components/neural/NeuralPro: A circular progress indicator with gradient styling that displays synthesis progress percentage using SVG.
frontend/src/components/neural/VocalDrop: A drag-and-drop file upload zone for audio files that validates file types and displays uploaded audio file details.
frontend/src/components/neural/VoiceHeal: Displays voice quality metrics (pitch stability, clarity index, tone quality) with progress bars and icons in a grid layout.
frontend/src/components/scheduling/Secur: A calendar-based booking interface for scheduling security audit calls with date selection, time slot picker, and confirmation functionality.
frontend/src/components/security/DarkWeb: Monitors and displays dark web threats with filtering by type/severity, auto-generates simulated threat alerts, and supports CSV export of threat reports.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/Acousti: A grid of environment cards (office, jet, airport, etc.) that can be toggled active/inactive for acoustic environment selection.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/Environ: An audio mixer interface with volume sliders for eight different ambient environments (office, rain, cafe, etc.) for audio masking control.
Displays a grid of environment audio spoofing options (office, cafe, airport, etc.) with toggle functionality to activate/deactivate background audio for each environment.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/Hardwar: Provides buttons to trigger fake OS update screens (Windows 11 and macOS) in fullscreen overlay mode with a close button.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/PacketJ: Simulates network degradation with a slider to control jitter percentage, displaying calculated quality, latency, and packet loss metrics with a Ctrl+Shift+L hotkey.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/PanicPr: Displays a fullscreen fake Windows update screen with progress bar as a panic mode overlay, dismissible via Ctrl+Shift+Q hotkey.
frontend/src/components/settings/Bandwid: Allows users to select streaming quality presets (low/medium/high/ultra) with live bandwidth usage meter and savings calculation.
frontend/src/components/sync/ConnectionL: Displays a scrollable terminal-style log of WebSocket connection events, including authentication, heartbeats, and Diffie-Hellman key exchanges with simulated entries.
frontend/src/components/testimonials/Tes: Renders a testimonial card with avatar, name, title, 5-star rating, and quote text in a styled card component.
frontend/src/components/transitions/Neur: Displays a fullscreen loading transition with AXON logo, progress bar, and scan line animation that completes at 100%.
frontend/src/components/transitions/Page: Simple wrapper component that applies a fade-in animation to its children for page transitions.
frontend/src/components/vault/IntelSessi: Displays a meeting session card with collapsible analysis (sentiment, cost) and transcript sections, showing meeting metadata like duration and participants.
frontend/src/components/vault/Subscripti: Displays a subscription tier card with pricing, features list, and selection button. Supports free, core, and shield tiers with monthly/yearly pricing and visual selection state with BorderBeam effect.

Manages subscription tier selection (free, core, shield) with monthly/yearly toggle. Persists selected tier to localStorage and displays three SubscriptionTierCard components with predefined feature lists.
Toggle switch component for switching between monthly and yearly billing periods. Highlights active option in emerald green and shows 20% savings label for yearly billing.
frontend/src/components/video/VideoWelco: Fixed-position video widget with play/pause, minimize/maximize, and close controls. Displays operator briefing thumbnail with playback simulation and can be minimized to a small button in the corner.
frontend/src/components/visualizer/Netwo: 3D globe visualization using Three.js showing global network nodes with latency-based color coding (green/yellow/red) and animated connection arcs between nodes. Updates latency values every 4 seconds.
frontend/src/components/visualizer/Neura: Canvas-based audio waveform visualizer rendering two animated sine waves with different frequencies and colors (blue and purple). Continuously animates to simulate real-time audio analysis.
frontend/src/components/visualizer/Water: Canvas-based waterfall spectrogram that scrolls frequency bars downward over time. Generates random frequency intensities displayed as neon green bars with varying opacity.
frontend/src/contexts/GhostModeContext.t: React context provider for managing ghost mode state. Persists ghost mode toggle state to sessionStorage and provides toggleGhostMode function to child components.
frontend/src/contexts/TelemetryContext.t: React context provider for logging and managing telemetry events with timestamps and severity types (info/success/warning/error). Maintains a rolling buffer of the last 50 events.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages backend actor instances with Internet Identity authentication. Handles actor creation with optional identity, initializes access control, and invalidates dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHapticFeedback.ts: Provides a hook for triggering haptic feedback (vibration) on supported devices with light, medium, and heavy intensity presets.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication for ICP, providing a React context and hooks for login, logout, identity management, and authentication status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useKeyboardShortcut.t: Hook that listens for keyboard shortcut combinations and executes a callback when all specified keys are pressed simultaneously.
frontend/src/hooks/useMousePosition.ts: Tracks mouse position relative to the center of a referenced HTML element, returning normalized x/y coordinates.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for all backend canister operations including user profiles, roles, meeting logs, panic events, audit logs, session recordings, and system health metrics.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubscriptionTier.t: Manages subscription tier state (free/core/shield) from localStorage, providing tier checks and feature unlock flags with cross-tab synchronization.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for theming (dark blue sidebar, light background), tactical glass effects, scanlines, and various animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin dashboard with tabs for user management, audit logs, and system health monitoring; currently displays the logged-in user's profile as an example.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsVault.tsx: Displays archived meeting logs in a grid layout with subscription tier information and handles loading/empty states.
frontend/src/pages/CommandCenter.tsx: Main dashboard page that displays KPI cards (QuantumInterlink, AssetShield, VocalHealth, QuickActions), a NeuralIngestInput component, and conditionally renders SpectralAnalysisCard based on subscription tier.
frontend/src/pages/DeviceSync.tsx: Device synchronization page that displays a QR code for mobile pairing and a connection log in a two-column bento grid layout.
frontend/src/pages/DevMetrics.tsx: Developer metrics page that displays system health data including cycles balance, heap/stable memory usage with charts, and critical threshold alerts using Recharts for visualization.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page with hero section, features grid (Sentinel Protocol, Quantum Encryption, Neural Network, etc.), testimonials, and footer with social links.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Authentication page with sign-in/register views, form state management, master bypass via triple-click on logo, and navigation to command center on successful login.
frontend/src/pages/MobileBiometric.tsx: Mobile-specific biometric authentication page with back navigation and BiometricScanner component.
frontend/src/pages/NeuralLab.tsx: Voice cloning lab page with persona specification textarea, vocal sample upload, neural synthesis progress tracking, voice health dashboard, and AI mirror status display.
frontend/src/pages/SentinelProtocol.tsx: Tactical countermeasures page featuring acoustic matrix, emergency panic button, environment mixer/spoofing, packet jitter simulator, and hardware mimicry controls, gated by subscription tier.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Settings page that displays the BandwidthOptimizer component for performance configuration.
frontend/src/pages/Subscriptions.tsx: Displays pricing tiers (Basic ₹299/month and Premium ₹499/month) with feature lists and subscription buttons that show toast notifications for simulated payment flow.
frontend/src/pages/TacticalRemote.tsx: Mobile command interface with large tactile buttons for panic mode, lag simulation, environment spoofing, and biometric scanning, using haptic feedback and toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/TeamManagementPage.ts: Simple page displaying team management interface with an ActiveIdentitiesCard component for managing team members and access levels.
frontend/src/pages/UnifiedDashboard.tsx: Main dashboard with sidebar navigation, user profile display, subscription tier badges, and multiple dashboard cards (AssetShield, NeuralIngest, VocalHealth, SpectralAnalysis, Synopsis, Pricing) with logout functionality.
frontend/src/utils/localStorageAuth.ts: Provides localStorage-based authentication with basic encryption/decryption, user registration, login validation, session management, and subscription plan tracking (free/core/shield).
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file that defines custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, extends theme with custom animations (accordion), border radius variables, and includes typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata file tracking a feature request to restore the application to Version 24, reverting changes from versions 25-28, with schema version 1.0.0 and project state version 3.
